posts.title: Golden Hour Magic in the Emerald City
posts.excerpt: There's something magical about Seattle during golden hour. The way the light reflects off the glass buildings and paints the sky in warm hues creates a scene that's both urban and ethereal.

posts.title: The Iconic Golden Gate Through the Fog
posts.excerpt: San Francisco's famous fog rolled in just as I arrived at the Golden Gate Bridge viewpoint. What started as a disappointment turned into one of my most dramatic shots.

posts.title: Lilac-breasted Roller: Colors of Chobe
posts.excerpt: Caught this Lilac‑breasted Roller perched between flights in Chobe National Park. Its brilliant plumage—turquoise, lilac, and emerald—lit up against the warm savanna tones.

posts.title: A Quiet Encounter with California's State Bird
posts.excerpt: Wildlife photography requires patience and respect. This beautiful California Quail was spotted during a peaceful hike in Point Reyes, completely unaware of my presence.

posts.title: The Gentle Giant of Victoria Falls
posts.excerpt: This magnificent elephant was casually walking down the road in Victoria Falls, Zimbabwe. It was incredible to witness such a powerful animal moving with such grace and confidence.

posts.title: The Vast Beauty of Chobe National Park
posts.excerpt: This incredible safari moment captured the essence of African wildlife in its natural habitat. The vast landscape, the golden light, and the sense of adventure made this one of the most memorable experiences.
